name: Cryogen
description:
This game was created for My First Game Jam: Winter 2020 . Using the given theme cold, I worked on my first game over the last 2 weeks combining the chilly theme with a twist on the likes of FnaF(Five Night's at Freddy's). Accept for the sounds I made this game entirely myself using Unreal Engine and utilizing tools like Blender, Aseprite etc.. There are currently 6 playable levels, which can be accessed by surviving the once that come before.

Controls:

ESC - Pause
LEFT MOUSE CLICK - Interact (move around, pick up items, access machines)

Credits:

Universal Sound FX  https://www.imphenzia.com/universal-sound-fx

Future Plans:

- Expanding on the scenario and creating more interesting interactions between the creatures exploring their quirks.

- Creating a Story attached to the situation, to let the player be more immersed in to the game
